category.name: DecisionApps.RelationBrowser
category.category_description: Preferences for Decision Apps Relation Browser.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_RelationBrowserViews.Relations
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of view names for "Relations" tab in the RelationBrowser client. The view names are defined in the Relation Browser UI configuration file, which is stored in the dataset named by the value of preference "RV1_DARB_UI_configuration_file_name".
